definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The Beagle's first stop was one of the Cape Verde Islands near the coast of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 贝尔格号第一站在非洲海岸附近的佛得角停靠。

sentences.english: The French Navy said Saturday the ship was probably near Cape Verde.
sentences.chinese: 周六，法国海军说船只可能在佛得角附近。

sentences.english: Neves also indicated that Cape Verde would firmly adhere to the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 内韦斯还表示佛得角将坚定奉行一个中国政策。

sentences.english: And I also visited a country with a very small size of population, called Cape Vede.
sentences.chinese: 我也访问了一个人口很少的国家，叫佛得角。

sentences.english: Multiple hurricanes formed around Cape Verde, off the west coast of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 很多飓风形成于位于非洲西海岸的佛得角附近。

pinyin: Duo1 mi3 ni2 jia1 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Vanuatu, country in the southwestern Pacific Ocean
